name: DUAT (Swagonite)
description:
Welcome to the afterlife!

You, the Pharoah, awaken to find your slaves have buried you with all your valuables, ready to travel to the afterlife... but the tomb is riddled with deadly traps!  Of course! Placed there to protect your most valuable possessions from would-be grave robbers!

Navigate your final resting place to collect the four Artifacts you were buried with. But beware the traps and guardians of the tomb!

Remote Games - Two person team consists of:

Swagonite - Art, Design & Programming

Evilhamsta - Design, Programming & Sound
